webcam.description: Photograph the blackboard or your notes to generate materials

mindmap.label: Mind Map
mindmap.description: Visualize connections between concepts with interactive maps

quiz.label: Quiz
quiz.description: Test your understanding with personalized quizzes

flashcard.label: Flashcards
flashcard.description: Memorize with smart flashcards and spaced repetition

demo.label: Interactive Demo
demo.description: Explore STEM concepts with interactive simulations

summary.label: Summary
summary.description: Generate clear and structured summaries of key concepts

timeline.label: Timeline
timeline.description: Organize historical events or sequences visually

formula.label: Formula
formula.description: Visualize and understand mathematical and scientific formulas

chart.label: Chart
chart.description: Create charts and visualizations for data and statistics

typing.label: Learn to Type
typing.description: Learn to type with progressive lessons and DSA accessibility

search.label: Web Search
search.description: Search for information, videos and educational resources on the web

welcome-form.welcome-intro: Welcome to the School I'd Like! I'm here to help you study in the way that works best for you.
welcome-form.dont-worry: Don't worry if something seems difficult - together we'll always find a way to understand it!
welcome-form.replay-mode-message: You're reviewing the tutorial. Your existing data will not be modified.

principles.welcome-to-school: Welcome to the School I'd Like, {name}!
principles.accessible-learning-desc: Personalized learning paths for your needs
principles.ai-teachers-desc: Experts in every subject, always available
principles.your-pace-desc: Learn whenever you want, for as long as you want
principles.no-judgment-desc: A safe space to learn and make mistakes
principles.melissa-quote: Remember: there are no stupid questions, only curious minds!

ready.ready-to-start: You're ready to start your adventure!
ready.prepared-for-you: I've prepared everything for you! Remember:
ready.always-talk: You can always talk to me - I'm here to help you with your learning method
ready.choose-professor: Choose a Professor - for every subject there's the right expert
ready.earn-xp: Earn XP - every lesson helps you level up!
ready.tutorial-end: End of tutorial. Click "Let's Go!" to return to the app.
